training_plan.title: Full Stack Developer Intern Internship Training Plan
training_plan.description: A comprehensive training plan for a 240-hour internship in Software Development using C#, designed to equip interns with the necessary skills and knowledge to excel as a Full Stack Developer Intern.

tasks.title: Task 1: Introduction to C#
tasks.description: Learn the basics of C# including variables, data types, loops, and functions.

skills.name: Programming
skills.description: The ability to write code in a programming language.

tasks.title: Task 2: Building a Simple Web Application
tasks.description: Build a simple web application using ASP.NET Core to understand the basics of web development.

techStacks.name: ASP.NET Core
techStacks.description: A cross-platform, open-source framework for building web applications.

skills.name: Web Development
skills.description: The ability to build web applications.

tasks.title: Task 3: Building a RESTful API
tasks.description: Design and implement a RESTful API using C# that supports CRUD operations on a simple entity.

techStacks.name: ASP.NET Core
techStacks.description: A cross-platform, open-source framework for building web applications.

skills.name: API Design
skills.description: Understanding of how to design and implement RESTful APIs.

tasks.title: Task 4: Frontend Integration
tasks.description: Integrate the RESTful API with a simple frontend application to display and interact with the data.

techStacks.name: React
techStacks.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

techStacks.name: JavaScript
techStacks.description: A high-level, dynamic, untyped, and interpreted programming language.

skills.name: Frontend Development
skills.description: Knowledge of frontend development principles and practices.

tasks.title: Task 5: Implement a RESTful API
tasks.description: Implement a RESTful API using C# that supports CRUD operations on a simple entity such as a 'Book' with attributes like title, author, and publication year.

techStacks.name: ASP.NET Core
techStacks.description: A cross-platform, open-source framework for building web applications.

skills.name: API Design
skills.description: The ability to design and implement RESTful APIs.

tasks.title: Task 6: Build a Single Page Application
tasks.description: Build a Single Page Application (SPA) using a JavaScript framework like React or Angular that consumes the API implemented in Task 5.

techStacks.name: React
techStacks.description: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

skills.name: Front-end Development
skills.description: The ability to build user interfaces and single page applications.
